0010100010000110 0100100100011110 0 -> sum: 0111000110100100, cout: 0

1010100000111111 1001000010101000 1 -> sum: 0011100011101000, cout: 1
1100010100001101 0010001001010110 1 -> sum: 1110011101100100, cout: 0
